attributes.action: make energy rating labels actually mean something.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because the existing energy labels take in products over 30 years old, roughly 95% of dishwashers and washing machines qualify as A-rated. Which is frankly ridiculous!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
